full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/7/2023 Serial "G" MARRIAGE CERTIFICATE SUMMAR MANAGUA CITY HALL No. 0536154 Taxes for services, in accord- ance with Art .33 of the Arbitrer's No. 49153 plan and Art. 574 of the Civil Code DARIO LUNA ESPINOZA Attorney and Registrar of the Civil State of the persons in Managua CERT I F I E S : That under No. 361 Volume II Folio 181 of the BOOK OF MARRIAGES that this Office carried during the year 1981 there is an Act that literally says: No. 361 MARIANO GALLO PADILLA. AND MARIA JARQUIN HOONTER. HOMEMAKER. = both Nicaraguans. HE IS A TELEGRAPHER DATE OF MARRIAGE. ELEVENTH DAY OF APRIL OF THE YEAR ONE THOUSAND NINE HUNDRED EIGHTY ONE TWENTY SECOND DAY OF APRIL OF THE YEAR ONE THOUSAND DATE RECORDED : NINE HUNDRED EIGHTY ONE DISTRICT OF MANAGUA, DEPARTMENT OF MANAGUA. . = VIDA M SEQUEIRA, ROSA A PEREZ. THE ABOVE DATA LITERALLY AGREE WITH THE ORIGINAL MANAGUA, TWENTY EIGHT DAY OF APRIL FO THE YEAR ONE THOUSAND NINE HUNDRED NINETY TWO. /s/ illegible ATORNEY AND REGISTRAR OF THE CIVIL STATE OF THE PERSONS OF MANAGUA MAYOR'S OFFICE OF MANAGUA CIVIL REGISTRY I, Manuel Castano, certify that I am competent in the Spanish language and that this translation is accurate. COUNTY OF DADE STATE OF FLORIDA Sworn before me to and subscribed this 22 day of August , 1994. 3. Notary maggly Public Carely MARCH State of Florida at Large #CC 350861
